reviewDescription: I've been using the Protonics Dash 4 speakers for a few weeks now, and I'm really impressed with their sound quality. Everything sounds clear and well-defined, from the subtle nuances of classical music to the driving beats of EDM. The wireless mic feature adds versatility for karaoke or presentations. If you're looking for a pair of speakers that offer great value for money, I highly recommend the Protonics Dash 4.

reviewTitle: Sound not good.  Feels like 15watt low cost speaker
reviewDescription: The full volume also is not good at all.  Feels like a 15-20 watt speaker. It's sound is too low for a closed room even forget outdoor party. Design looks good but performance is not worthy at all.

reviewTitle: Product failure within six months and poor service support
reviewDescription: Within six months charging system failed. No email support. reviewTitle: Sound that Rocks, Value for Money - Dash 4
reviewDescription: 50 watts of crystal-clear audio with thumping bass boost technology guarantees room-filling sound that'll get everyone moving. Whether you're belting out ballads or rocking out to anthems, the Dash 4 delivers.Karaoke Magic - The included wireless microphone with vocal echo effects lets you transform any song into your personal karaoke masterpiece. Plus, the mic seamlessly connects via Bluetooth, so you can roam the room and unleash your inner rockstar without missing a beat.Happy to with Portronics Dash 4
